name: 叶夫盖尼·拉扎列夫 Evgeniy Lazarev
movies: 战争之王 Lord of War
intro:
One of the most famous actors in Russia Eugene was the first actor to play Stanely Kowalskie in "Streetcar Named Desire" in a Russian stage adaptation.　　He formerly taught at the Stanislavsky Summer School in Cambridge, Massachusetts.　　Professor of Moscow Art Theater Studio School and the Theater Academy of Russia　　He was awarded the title of National Artist of Russia　　From 1986 to 1990, he was professor of acting for Andrey Zv...(展开全部)
　　One of the most famous actors in Russia Eugene was the first actor to play Stanely Kowalskie in "Streetcar Named Desire" in a Russian stage adaptation.　　He formerly taught at the Stanislavsky Summer School in Cambridge, Massachusetts.　　Professor of Moscow Art Theater Studio School and the Theater Academy of Russia　　He was awarded the title of National Artist of Russia　　From 1986 to 1990, he was professor of acting for Andrey Zvyagintsev, the Russian film director who was awarded the Golden Lion at Venice Film Festival for his movie Vozvrashchenie (2003).　　January 2008 - Professor of Acting at The School of Cinematic Arts in USC.　　Teaching acting and directing at USC School of Cinema and Television, Stella Adler Academy of Acting-Los Angeles, California. [September 2003]　　Teaching acting and directing at USC School of Cinema and Television, Stella Adler Academy of Acting-Los Angeles, California. [February 2005]　　Teaching directing and acting at The School of The Cinematic Arts of The USC, Los Angeles, CA. [October 2009]
hezuo: 塔尼特·菲尼克斯 Tanit Phoenix
尼古拉斯·凯奇 Nicolas Cage
茂文·道格拉斯 Melvyn Douglas
